name: Betty's Crave
description:
_______________________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS

MOVE - ARROW KEYS

SHOOT - X

_______________________________________________________________________________________

You play as Betty the Pit Bull on your weekly task of re-stocking the bone pile in your cozy den. Luckily you have a convenient grave yard right out side your cave, filled with juicy skeletons.

Your goal is to re-stock your bone pile with the amount of bones needed for each pile "level".

Take note that if Betty collects too many bones at once, she'll become Heavy, which will decrease her mobility drastically.

This game was made for the Secret Jam #1 September 2022.

As the jam name suggests there is a small secret/easter egg/ reference in the game for you to find :)
